member.summary: Trivial distortion correction. Only shrinkage is accounted for.

member.name: T:SySal.Processing.SimpleTrackPostProcessing.SimpleTrackPostProcessor
member.summary: Computes the geometrical parameters of tracks from their grains and optionally sweeps out double measurements.

member.name: P:SySal.Processing.SimpleTrackPostProcessing.SimpleTrackPostProcessor.Expose
member.summary: Exposes / hides generation of additional info. This is a dummy implementation, since this class has no information to expose.

member.summary: Gets the additional information. This is a dummy implementation, since this class has no information to expose.

member.name: P:SySal.Processing.SimpleTrackPostProcessing.SimpleTrackPostProcessor.DistortionInfo
member.summary: Retrieves the DistortionCorrection the PostProcessor used to correct the grains.

member.name: M:SySal.Processing.SimpleTrackPostProcessing.SimpleTrackPostProcessor.Process(SySal.Tracking.Grain[][],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Processes the grain sequences supplied, optionally corrects them, and computes the geometrical parameters of each track.
